entry.title: Rain
entry.summary:
Author: Lucerne3149D

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,138Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: Damian doesn’t move, only lifts his eyes. His voice is low and even: “You’re forty-seven minutes late, Richard.” “Call me Dick.” Dick steps forward, drops to one knee on the mat, and leans in close until their breaths almost touch. “You know I hate being called by my full name—especially by you.” Damian finally moves. He reaches out, grips Dick’s jaw in one hand, thumb pressing hard against his lips, voice carrying clear command: “Then prove to me how much you hate it.”

entry.title: In the Name of the Father
entry.summary:
Author: noctstate

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,602Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: Like a particularly annoying fly, Damian finally grabs onto Dick, hand circling the back of his neck, his fingers come just shy of touching at the front. The flitting around, the buzz of his never-ending string of consciousness, straight from brain to mouth, unfiltered. He just wants to finish cataloguing the evidence of their recent cases. A moment of silence. “Hey, come on, let—” His plea cuts short with the thud of the side of his face connecting with the metal of the Batcomputer’s desk. Damian holds him there, keeps his hand wrapped around the boy’s throat. He doesn’t squeeze or attempt to restrict his breathing, he just wants to make a point. Sometimes that takes a little more force, and this annoying behavior has been going on long enough.

entry.summary:
Author: Kaat30

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,312Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 283

Summary: Damian al Ghul became the Demon's head when he was 19 years old. He deemed Ra's and Talia unfit to rule the League of Assassins and disposed of them, starting a new era for the league with a ruthless leader at its head. Where Ra's had an obsession with Tim Drake, and Talia had an obsession with Bruce Wayne, Damian has his own obsession with a member of the Batfamily. Now Damian is 26 years old and on his way to Gotham to finally take what belongs to him, or rather, whom.

entry.title: Sink Into the Feeling
entry.summary:
Author: noctstate

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,517Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 32

Summary: It's after an hour of actual silence that Dick finally stands from the computer. He's kept an eye on Damian, just the occasional glance his way, to make sure he hasn't passed out, isn't trying to escape, hasn't somehow managed to hurt himself — all entirely real concerns, given just how belligerent he was acting prior. It'd taken long enough for the thrashing, the shouting and muffled threats to die down, several instances of restarting the timer later, and… And Damian's finally gone lax. He’s let the ropes take his weight fully, head bent, the back of his neck exposed, and the thinnest string of saliva dripping into a puddle beneath his bound and suspended body. entry.title: Light Work
entry.summary:
Author: Autumn_Bitters (Winterlynne_Norvic)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,677Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 65

Summary: Even with all the Batmen popping up around the world, and the new files that come in every day, Dick can’t say he recognized the Batman in front of him. He holds himself with an easy confidence that is hard won. Shoulders back and straight, but at ease even when Dick across from him isn’t. Most notable, though, is the stark white Batsuit. It is pristine in its whiteness. He practically shines even in the dark, as if internally illuminated. How Dick didn’t notice him when he practically gives off an aura speaks both to how distracted Dick actually is, and how skilled the Batman standing across from him is, too. “You…” Dick trails off. “I don’t know you.” … Or—The end of a routine patrol night as Batman for Dick gets a lot less routine when a strangely familiar but unknown Batman in a white batsuit appears in Gotham under his watch.

entry.title: Be My Breath (Through The Deep, Deep Water)
entry.summary:
Author: Autumn_Bitters (Winterlynne_Norvic)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,579Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 72

Summary: Damian may be in love with him, but he does have enough respect for himself to not let that love continuously lead him blindly into more hurt and unfulfilled expectations. At least not today. Today he refuses to settle for this torture, because Damian does not want him for only a night. Nor a day. A week. A month. A year. Only forever will do, and forever does not sit behind that door. Forever will not come if he lets Richard kiss him, only to push Damian away any time a kiss might become more and he remembers his morals, or whatever his excuses are masquerading as. Damian is not a good person, but he is still a person. … Or, Dick and Damian leave behind the vigilante life to figure out who they are away from Gotham and five times Dick makes everything a lot more complicated between himself and Damian on their trip, plus one where they come back home and finally figure their shit out.
